alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:04AM EDT until June 15 at 6:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM EDT FOR WESTERN MILLER...SOUTHWESTERN CALHOUN AND CENTRAL EARLY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA... At 604 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Leary to near Colquitt to 10 miles southeast of Columbia, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Centerville, Parksville, Howards Mill, Mayhaw, Cuba, Commissary Hill, Killarney, Turman, Early Co A/p, Hentown, Rowena and Old Damascus. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
